verses.verse: I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> <S%H430>you<s%>, my God, O <S%H4428>king<s%>; and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
Every <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H1984>you<s%>; and I will praise your <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
<S%H1419>Great<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>; and his <S%H1420>greatness<s%> is <S%H2714>unsearchable<s%>.
<S%H1755>One<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall <S%H7623>praise<s%> your <S%H4639>works<s%> to <S%H5046>another<s%>, and shall declare your mighty <S%H1369>acts<s%>.
I will <S%H7878>speak<s%> of the <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H1926>honor<s%> of your <S%H1935>majesty<s%>, and of your <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> <S%H1697>works<s%>.
And men shall <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H5807>might<s%> of your terrible <S%H3372>acts<s%>: and I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> your <S%H1420>greatness<s%>.
They shall abundantly <S%H5042>utter<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of your <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%>, and shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, and full of <S%H7349>compassion<s%>; <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%>, and of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H7356>all<s%>: and his tender mercies are over all his <S%H4639>works<s%>.
All your <S%H4639>works<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord; and your <S%H2623>saints<s%> shall bless <S%H1288>you<s%>.
They shall <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of your <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H1696>talk<s%> of your <S%H1369>power<s%>;
To make <S%H3045>known<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> his mighty <S%H1369>acts<s%>, and the <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H1926>majesty<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.
Your <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> is a <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and your <S%H4475>dominion<s%> endures throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5564>upholds<s%> all that <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and raises <S%H2210>up<s%> all those that be bowed <S%H3721>down<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all <S%H7663>wait<s%> upon <S%H5414>you<s%>; and you give them their <S%H400>food<s%> in due <S%H6256>season<s%>.
You <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H7646>satisfiest<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of every living <S%H2416>thing<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H2623>holy<s%> in all his <S%H4639>works<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> unto all them that <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H7121>him<s%>, to all that call upon him in <S%H571>truth<s%>.
He will <S%H6213>fulfill<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H8085>him<s%>: he also will hear their <S%H7775>cry<s%>, and will save <S%H3467>them<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> all them that <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7563>him<s%>: but all the wicked will he <S%H8045>destroy<s%>.

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and let all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
